snek

Class snek

  • java.lang.Object
    • snek.snek

  • public class snek
extends java.lang.Object
    The snek class implements the movable character that player controls.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Essi Varjonen, Kim Rosengren, Miikka Wirtanen, Siiri Ylönen, Viljami Ruokonen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      snek()
      This constructor creates the movable snek character.
